quotes.quote: I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
Mindsets are contagious. So choose the people you populate your life with extremely well.
My mindset at this stage, especially after having a daughter it's just changed my whole outlook.

As an organization changes your mindset as a leader also has to change. This becomes the lid to you organization. Whenever my organization starts to settle I believe I have to lift my lid, my capacity I have to think and act in a different way to achieve different results.
I think of religion as something that stains the person. It's a mindset you can never get free from, it's always in the back of your head.
You can accomplish anything you want in life, if you help enough other people get what they want.
Until your dream dominates your mindset, you'll never wake up to your greatness.
A positive mindset, not a doomsday mentality, supports being exceptional.
What makes you tough is your mindset and I believe anyone can be tough.
Performancism is the mindset that equates our identity and value directly with our performance and accomplishments.
Only changes in mindsets can extend the frontiers of the possible.
Risk more than others think is safe. Care more than others think is wise. Dream more than others think is practical. Expect more than others think is possible.

It takes a different mindset to be successful in anything; that's why there's not a lot of super duper successful people, because it's guys I know who may be ten times more talented than me, but they don't work as hard.
If you do not like anything, alter it. If you can not change it, adjust your mindset. Will not complain.
Remember that mindsets can not be changed through force and coercion. No idea can ever be forcibly thrust upon any one.
To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail.
You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
Christians need to have a mindset of victory, because God has destined us for victory.
Happiness depends on your mindset and attitude.
Leadership is a mindset that shifts from being a victim to creating results. Any one of us can demonstrate leadership in our work and within our lives.
The difference between average and good. Good and Great! Great and Phenomenal! It's their mindset!
I think you should have a mindset of getting to the playoffs, because once you get in the playoffs, it is kind of a crapshoot.

Everyone is looking for the sure thing. They are looking to hedge their bet. They think the way to do that is to go with a proven quantity, a remake of something you have already seen. That is their mindset.
I am the master of my fate; I am the captain of my soul.
I have a mindset that says bipartisanship ought to consist of democrats coming to the republican point of view.
No matter what comes your way, shake it off and move forward. When you have a positive mindset, you can't be defeated.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
We all have possibilities we don't know about. We can do things we don't even dream we can do.
My greatest challenge has been to change the mindset of people. Mindsets play strange tricks on us. We see things the way our minds have instructed our eyes to see.
